definition: attendant of the bride or bridegroom at a wedding
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: Best man ready to do his dad proud?
sentences.chinese: 男儐相準備好讓父親感到榮幸了嗎？

sentences.english: Blair: Best man speech going that well?
sentences.chinese: 男儐相的演講進展順利嗎？

sentences.english: Harry's wedding will be on the Valentine's Day. and I'll be the bestman.
sentences.chinese: 亨利的婚禮將在情人節舉行，我擔任男儐相。

sentences.english: The best man is usually a brother, if the groom has one.
sentences.chinese: 如果新郎有兄弟的話一般由他來擔任男儐相。

sentences.english: He asked me to be his best man.
Jim asked his brother to stand up with him.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆請他弟弟作他的儐相。

sentences.english: The high standards and high wedding, the presidential guest best man.
sentences.chinese: 此次婚禮規格之高，有總統客串男儐相。

sentences.english: Thanks. Will you be our best man?
sentences.chinese: 謝謝。你能做我們的儐相嗎？

sentences.english: The bridegroom and best man wore white carnations in their buttonholes.
sentences.chinese: 新郎和男儐相的鈕釦孔上都插了一朵白色的康乃馨。

sentences.english: Amy was the maid of honor and Kyrie, Amber, and Melissa were the bridesmaids.
sentences.chinese: 艾米是伴娘，凱麗，安布爾和梅利莎做女儐相。

sentences.english: She was a bridesmaid at the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 她在婚禮上擔任女儐相。

sentences.english: The best man always keeps the rings.
sentences.chinese: 男儐相總是保管戒指的。

sentences.english: Why don't you ask me to stand up with you?
Nerves are about anxiety over the event - will the best man get drunk?
sentences.chinese: 緊張是指對於事件本身的焦慮，男儐相是否會喝醉？
